|cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G08ABAEA |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M8DN-DH |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=3 |serial=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1518;88E1518-NNB2; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=High Performance CPLD;Altera;EPM3064A;;1;,,, CMOS 8K 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Holtek;HT24LC08;;1;,,, I2C Serial Real Time Clock;Maxim Integrated;DS1337;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, PCI Express to SATA II Host Controller;JMicron;JMB360;;1;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;2;,,, 3A Source/Sink DDR Terminator Regulator;TI;TPS51100;;1;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1; |flags=eSATA, RTC, fan, metal case, power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.14;KW LSP 5.0.3; |oui_eth=00:D0:4B }} {{TagLine|LaCie 2Big NAS}} :[https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/2big-nas/ Support page] "2Big-NAS-V2R", "1108 150 Rev B2" and "LaCie Group" :are silkscreened on the board. {{See also|LaCie}} ===Specifications=== * Network Storage 2-bay • [http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=start LaCie NAS Wiki] • [http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=2big_nas Spec.] :Processor: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (Armada 300) @2.0GHz :Memory: 256MB DDR3; Hard drives: 2x 3.5" (SATA) :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1518 (Alaska) GbE (10/100/1000) :Ports: 1x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB 2.0, 1x eSATA ===Links=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/5838/lacies-2big-nas-review ''LaCie's 2big NAS Review'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/lacie-2big-nas-6tb-review ''LaCie 2big NAS 6TB Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] *[http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=2big_nas ''LaCie 2big NAS'' on '''LaCie NAS Wiki'''] ==Images== File:LaCie 2Big NAS Top.jpeg|Board top File:LaCie 2Big NAS Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
